meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with white and yellow flowers, typically used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The camomile in the garden has beautiful white and yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy drinking tea made from camomile flowers.
meanings.sent3: The camomile plant decided to open a herbal medicine shop.
meanings.sent4: Herbal medicine is like camomile, bringing natural healing.
meanings.sent5: The scent of camomile flowers filled the room, calming everyone.

meanings.definition: An aromatic Eurasian plant with white and yellow daisylike flowers, used in herbal medicine and in making tea.
meanings.sent1: The camomile from Europe has a lovely aroma.
meanings.sent2: I like to brew a cup of tea with camomile flowers.
meanings.sent3: The camomile plant joined a tea party with other herbs.
meanings.sent4: Herbal tea with camomile is a soothing hug in a cup.
meanings.sent5: The taste of camomile tea danced on my tongue like a gentle breeze.
